C44.0856836,45.3141982 50.5211898,38.5735601 51.1758361,30.8176656 C51.6077846,25.8244754 51.6031438,20.8031139 51.1619665,15.8107307 L51.1619665,15.8107307 Z" id="Shape"                 </g>
            </g>
        </g>
      </svg>
    </div>
    <h1 id="test" class="deep-link"><a href="#test">Test</a></h1>
<h2 id="service-environment-configuration" class="deep-link"><a href="#service-environment-configuration">Service Environment Configuration</a></h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Type</th>
<th>Required</th>
<th>Default</th>
<th>Environment Variable</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><code>loglevel</code></td>
<td>STRING</td>
<td>no</td>
<td><code>info</code></td>
<td><code>LOGLEVEL</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>port</code></td>
<td>NUMBER</td>
<td>no</td>
<td><code>8088</code></td>
<td><code>PORT</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>timestamps</code></td>
<td>BOOLEAN</td>
<td>no</td>
<td>(none)</td>
<td><code>LOG_TIMESTAMPS</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>name</code></td>
<td>STRING</td>
<td>yes</td>
<td>(none)</td>
<td><code>NAME</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>db_pool_max</code></td>
<td>NUMBER</td>
<td>no</td>
<td><code>50</code></td>
<td><code>DB_POOL_MAX</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>db_pool_min</code></td>
<td>NUMBER</td>
<td>no</td>
<td><code>2</code></td>
<td><code>DB_POOL_MIN</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>db_pool_idle_timeout</code></td>
<td>NUMBER</td>
<td>no</td>
<td><code>10000</code></td>
<td><code>DB_POOL_IDLE_TIMEOUT</code></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="api" class="deep-link"><a href="#api">API</a></h2>
<ul>
<li><a href="#list-organzations">List Organzations</a></li>
<li><a href="#create-organization">Create organization</a></li>
<li><a href="#create-department">Create Department</a></li>
<li><a href="#health-check">Health Check</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="list-organzations" class="deep-link"><a href="#list-organzations">List Organzations</a></h3>
<p>Gets all organizations</p>
<pre><code>GET /organization
</code></pre>
<h4 id="parameters" class="deep-link"><a href="#parameters">Parameters</a></h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Type</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><code>id</code></td>
<td><code>uuid (v4)</code></td>
<td>id</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>role</code></td>
<td><code>enum [&quot;admin&quot;, &quot;manager&quot;, &quot;agent&quot;]</code></td>
<td>The user&apos;s role</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<h4 id="request" class="deep-link"><a href="#request">Request</a></h4>
<div><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="text"><span>curl&#xA0;-s&#xA0;-H&#xA0;&apos;Content-type:&#xA0;application/json&apos;&#xA0;-H&#xA0;&apos;Accept:&#xA0;application/json&apos;&#xA0;</span><span class="markup underline link hyperlink"><span>http://localhost:8088/organization</span></span></span></div></pre></div>
<h4 id="response" class="deep-link"><a href="#response">Response</a></h4>
<div class="highlight"><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="text"><span>Status:&#xA0;200&#xA0;OK</span></span></div></pre></div>
<div class="highlight json"><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure array json"><span class="punctuation definition array begin json"><span>[</span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure array json"><span>&#xA0;&#xA0;</span><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation definition dictionary begin json"><span>{</span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure array json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span>&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;&#xA0;</span><span class="string quoted double json"><span class="punctuation definition string begin json"><span>&quot;</span></span><span>id</span><span class="punctuation definition string end json"><span>&quot;</span></span></span><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation separator dictionary key-value json"><span>:</span></span><span>&#xA0;</span><span class="string quoted double json"><span class="punctuation definition string begin json"><span>&quot;</span></span><span>5eae86ea-1913-49cd-b7d1-c7e28d0197e6</span><span class="punctuation definition string end json"><span>&quot;</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure array json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span>&#xA0;&#xA0;</span></span><span class="punctuation definition dictionary end json"><span>}</span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure array json"><span class="punctuation definition array end json"><span>]</span></span></span></span></div></pre></div>

<hr>
<h3 id="create-organization" class="deep-link"><a href="#create-organization">Create organization</a></h3>
<p>Gets all organizations</p>
<pre><code>POST /organization
</code></pre>
<h4 id="input" class="deep-link"><a href="#input">Input</a></h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Type</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><code>id</code></td>
<td><code>uuid (v4)</code></td>
<td>id</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<h4 id="request-1" class="deep-link"><a href="#request-1">Request</a></h4>
<div><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="text"><span>curl&#xA0;-s&#xA0;-H&#xA0;&apos;Content-type:&#xA0;application/json&apos;&#xA0;-H&#xA0;&apos;Accept:&#xA0;application/json&apos;&#xA0;</span><span class="markup underline link hyperlink"><span>http://localhost:8088/organization</span></span><span>&#xA0;-X&#xA0;POST&#xA0;-d&#xA0;&apos;{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;885b440b-8b0e-445c-bd0f-b212ad0fdc41&quot;}&apos;</span></span></div></pre></div>
<h4 id="response-1" class="deep-link"><a href="#response-1">Response</a></h4>
<div class="highlight"><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="text"><span>Status:&#xA0;200&#xA0;OK</span></span></div></pre></div>
<div class="highlight json"><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation definition dictionary begin json"><span>{</span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span>&#xA0;&#xA0;</span><span class="string quoted double json"><span class="punctuation definition string begin json"><span>&quot;</span></span><span>id</span><span class="punctuation definition string end json"><span>&quot;</span></span></span><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation separator dictionary key-value json"><span>:</span></span><span>&#xA0;</span><span class="string quoted double json"><span class="punctuation definition string begin json"><span>&quot;</span></span><span>5eae86ea-1913-49cd-b7d1-c7e28d0197e6</span><span class="punctuation definition string end json"><span>&quot;</span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation definition dictionary end json"><span>}</span></span></span></span></div></pre></div>

<hr>
<h3 id="create-department" class="deep-link"><a href="#create-department">Create Department</a></h3>
<p>Creates a department</p>
<pre><code>POST /department
</code></pre>
<h4 id="request-2" class="deep-link"><a href="#request-2">Request</a></h4>
<div><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="text"><span>curl&#xA0;-s&#xA0;-H&#xA0;&apos;Content-type:&#xA0;application/json&apos;&#xA0;-H&#xA0;&apos;Accept:&#xA0;application/json&apos;&#xA0;</span><span class="markup underline link hyperlink"><span>http://localhost:8088/department</span></span><span>&#xA0;-X&#xA0;POST</span></span></div></pre></div>
<h4 id="response-2" class="deep-link"><a href="#response-2">Response</a></h4>
<div class="highlight"><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="text"><span>Status:&#xA0;200&#xA0;OK</span></span></div></pre></div>
<div class="highlight json"><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation definition dictionary begin json"><span>{</span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span>&#xA0;&#xA0;</span><span class="string quoted double json"><span class="punctuation definition string begin json"><span>&quot;</span></span><span>id</span><span class="punctuation definition string end json"><span>&quot;</span></span></span><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation separator dictionary key-value json"><span>:</span></span><span>&#xA0;</span><span class="string quoted double json"><span class="punctuation definition string begin json"><span>&quot;</span></span><span>5eae86ea-1913-49cd-b7d1-c7e28d0197e6</span><span class="punctuation definition string end json"><span>&quot;</span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation definition dictionary end json"><span>}</span></span></span></span></div></pre></div>
<div class="alert"><p><strong>Note:</strong> Output Note</p></div>
<hr>
<h3 id="health-check" class="deep-link"><a href="#health-check">Health Check</a></h3>
<p>Return status of parent service</p>
<pre><code>GET /health_check
</code></pre>
<h4 id="request-3" class="deep-link"><a href="#request-3">Request</a></h4>
<div><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="text"><span>curl&#xA0;-s&#xA0;-H&#xA0;&apos;Content-type:&#xA0;application/json&apos;&#xA0;-H&#xA0;&apos;Accept:&#xA0;application/json&apos;&#xA0;</span><span class="markup underline link hyperlink"><span>http://localhost:8088/health_check</span></span></span></div></pre></div>
<h4 id="response-3" class="deep-link"><a href="#response-3">Response</a></h4>
<div class="highlight"><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="text"><span>Status:&#xA0;200&#xA0;OK</span></span></div></pre></div>
<div class="highlight json"><pre class="editor editor-colors"><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation definition dictionary begin json"><span>{</span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span>&#xA0;&#xA0;</span><span class="string quoted double json"><span class="punctuation definition string begin json"><span>&quot;</span></span><span>name</span><span class="punctuation definition string end json"><span>&quot;</span></span></span><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation separator dictionary key-value json"><span>:</span></span><span>&#xA0;</span><span class="string quoted double json"><span class="punctuation definition string begin json"><span>&quot;</span></span><span>helpdotcom-service</span><span class="punctuation definition string end json"><span>&quot;</span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="line"><span class="source json"><span class="meta structure dictionary json"><span class="punctuation definition dictionary end json"><span>}</span></span></span></span></div></pre></div>
<hr>
